software.description:
Shape analysis has become of increasing interest to the medical community due to its potential to precisely locate morphological changes between healthy and pathological structures. SPHARM-PDM is a tool that computes point-based models using a parametric boundary description for the computing of Shape analysis.

Since July 2017, SPHARM-PDM is now available as a 3D Slicer extension (http://www.slicer.org) and as part of SlicerSALT (salt.slicer.org). Dissemination of SPHARM-PDM through SlicerSALT is now the major mode of dissemination for downloading new versions of SPHARM-PDM.

For questions, please refer to the new SlicerSALT forum at https://discourse.slicer.org/c/community...

Note: the modules available in the downloads section have not been updated since 2015
software.maintainer: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
